appliedGuidelines.reason: Incorporated priorities order and security emphasis consistent with project guidelines.
Updated Java version to 16 to conform with project guidelines.
Revised access modifiers to use public by default, minimizing private, per project guidelines.
Updated design patterns guideline to aggressively apply Factory, Builder, Strategy, Observer as per project guidelines.
Modified encapsulation guideline to keep implementation details public and avoid helper methods as per project guidelines.
Spring Boot versioning referenced in project guidelines; noted in framework extensions.
Referenced configuration preferences consistent with project guidelines in framework extensions.
Acknowledged repository pattern preference from project guidelines in framework extensions.
